headline: Architect | 3D design | BIM | Construction management
about:
Soy un arquitecto creativo e innovador con 9 años de experiencia en el diseño y la construcción de viviendas residenciales, espacios comerciales y oficinas. Mi pasión por el diseño y mi capacidad para crear espacios únicos y funcionales me han permitido liderar proyectos de alto perfil en diversos sectores.

Como experto en software de diseño y modelado, puedo visualizar con precisión el resultado final de cada proyecto y garantizar que cada detalle satisfaga las necesidades de mis clientes. También tengo experiencia como gestor de proyectos, coordinando equipos multidisciplinares, gestionando presupuestos y supervisando obras.

Me dedico a mantenerme al día de las últimas tendencias en arquitectura y diseño, por lo que aprender es uno de mis intereses personales. Además, tengo un gran interés por el diseño de interiores y el diseño de mobiliario, con una amplia experiencia en ambas áreas.
topSkills: Arquitectura • Trabajo en equipo • Diseño • Gestión de obras de construcción • Planimetria

profileTopEducation.schoolName: FAU UNT | Facultad de Arquitectura y Urbanismo | Universidad Nacional de Tucumán

experience.description: Elaboración de planos, coordinación y seguimiento de proyectos, elaboración de presupuestos. Diseño gráfico y 3D de proyectos de arquitectura y construcción.

Working with the team at Judith Laura Gurewitz's architectural firm in Israel, I contributed to the planimetry, 3D design, layout and realisation of architectural portfolios and projects for various corporate clients and private residences.

As an architect and founder of ELW Architecture Studio, I have had the opportunity to lead a variety of exciting projects, including: 

• Architecture projects: design and construction of 19 family homes in different areas of Tucumán province, 1 commercial gallery with 11 storefronts, and 1 showroom. 
• Project management: Construction oversight for 12 family homes.
• Remodeling and expansion (design and construction oversight): 2 family homes, 2 apartments, 1 medical center, and 1 commercial business.
• Total area constructed: 4,337 m2.

Through these experiences, I have developed a comprehensive understanding of every phase of the construction process, from initial design concepts to project management and execution. 

My proficiency with a range of design software, including CorelDRAW, Illustrator, Photoshop, AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, and Lumion, allows me to create detailed and accurate visual representations of my designs and ensure that each project is executed to the highest standard of quality.

experience.location: San Miguel de Tucumán, Tucumán, Argentina
experience.description:
Working within the Prevention and Early Detection of Colorectal Cancer program, I was responsible for overseeing all aspects of the program's implementation in the province of Tucuman. This involved coordinating with medical professionals and staff, as well as producing detailed statistics and reports for the National Cancer Institute. 

I leveraged my strong organizational skills and attention to detail to ensure that the program operated efficiently. Through my work, I gained a deep understanding of the healthcare industry and the importance of proactive prevention measures in combating serious illnesses such as colorectal cancer.

I have a keen interest in furniture and interior design, and have experience in creating custom pieces for both residential and commercial spaces. My skillset includes proficiency in planimetry, 3D design, and furniture construction.
skills: Gestión de proyectos de diseño de interiores

experience.description:
As the director of the Architecture Committee of the Altos San Pablo neighborhood, my main task was to review and approve the planimetry of the homeowners in the private neighborhood located in San Pablo, Tucuman, Argentina. 

Additionally, I carried out site visits to ensure that the constructions were executed according to the established regulations. My goal was to ensure quality and coherence in the neighborhood's architecture, creating a harmonious and pleasant environment for all its residents.

experience.location: San Miguel de Tucumán, Tucumán, Argentina
experience.description:
At ERDA S.A., I successfully coordinated multidisciplinary teams and directed construction projects, overseeing planning and budgeting to ensure optimal resource utilization. 
Additionally, I played an instrumental role in creating proposals and project presentations for potential clients, drawing on my expertise in architecture to deliver effective solutions.

headline: Analista QA
about:
Analista de Calidad con 8 años de experiencia en el aseguramiento de la calidad de software. Especializada en diseño y ejecución de pruebas, identificación de defectos y colaboración estrecha con equipos de desarrollo para mejorar la calidad del producto mediante uso de metodologías ágiles. Comprometido con la entrega de productos de alta calidad mediante la implementación efectiva de estrategias de pruebas.
Con ganas de dar mis primeros pasos hacia la automatización de pruebas.

experience.description:
Actualmente formo parte del equipo de QA en el proyecto de Massimo Dutti, en una primera instancia me he desempeñado en el área de analítica digital, enfocado en la validación de eventos y seguimiento de datos implementados en diversas plataformas (Web y Mobile). Actualmente estoy en el área funcional del proyecto.

🔹 Validación de eventos enviados a Google Analytics 4 (GA4) y Zenit, contrastando contra las guías de etiquetado definidas por el equipo de analítica
🔹 Verificación de la correcta implementación de consentimientos de cookies mediante OneTrust, evaluando los reportes en múltiples plataformas
🔹 Uso de herramientas específicas para testing de eventos:
    • App de David Vallejos para eventos de GA4 en apps móviles
    • Charles Web Debugging Proxy para inspección de tráfico de eventos de Zenit
🔹 Pruebas realizadas en entorno local levantando ramas de desarrollo desde Visual Studio, apuntando a distintos entornos
🔹 Diseño y ejecución de casos de prueba funcionales, de integración y regresión, con registro y seguimiento de bugs en Jira
🔹 Automatización de pruebas funcionales usando Cypress
🔹 Pruebas en apps móviles utilizando App Center y TestFlight
🔹 Testing en múltiples dispositivos y navegadores utilizando Sauce Labs

headline: Electronic Engineer - Embedded Software/Hardware Developer.R&D SW Engineer
about:
Electronic and software developments are my passion. Since I was a kid, I always asked myself how electronics things work and that’s bring me to finish my studies to become an electronic engineer.

I consider myself a proactive and organized person, that sets high objectives and looks for achieving them with high standards of quality and efficiency.

I enjoy learning constantly, always open to improvement and change, taking the best out of me and from people around me.

Playing instruments, listening to music, doing some electronic project, playing with software’s and travelling are my other passions.

Electronic Engineer | Software developer | Hardware developer | embedded engineer | embedded software engineer | IoT | IIoT

experience.description:
As a Senior C++ Developer at Keo GmbH, I contributed to the development and maintenance of a suite of Linux libraries that enable IoT device communication through the EEBUS communication standard. Keo is renowned for its high-quality C++ libraries that use the Curiously Recurring Template Pattern (CRTP). This role involved collaborating with an international team and working in English as the primary language.

Key contributions:
- Improved the TLS implementation for the SHIP layer of EEBUS to enhance security and reliability.
- Designed and implemented new EEBUS use cases, expanding the system's capabilities.
- Conducted comprehensive code analysis and task definition to streamline project execution.
- Maintained extensive testing pipelines, including unit tests with GTest, system tests using Docker, and integration and regression testing with a in house Python suite.

Developer Engineer for the Cloud Core Policy Controller (CCPC) in the 5G Network, using Python, C++ and Golang.

Create, maintain and deploy micro-services, using docker, kubernetes and helm.

CCPC allows operators to deploy dual mode EPC/5GC policy control service resource selection (PCF/PCRF) with single O&M and orchestration.

Worked in projects using the following programing languages: C, C++, Python, JavaScript. Also, develop an IoT product using C++ and process data using Python in a custom secure server.

Worked in programming/SCADA/HMI projects for Nestle, Telefonica, Claro, Prisma, Garrahan Hospital, among other big companies Using Schneider Electric HW/SW. 

In this field, the most common problems came from the communications between all of the different protocols used along the industries and others marks of PLCs. With this I got a lot of experience using TCP IP, UDP, Ethernet IP, among others.

We develop a communication between two software’s for manufactures using HTTPS with the most security level from the moment.

education.description:
Equivalent to US bachelor’s + master’s. Relevant coursework: Algorithms & Programming - Probability & Statistics - IP Networking I, II - Analog and Digital Communications - Data Communications - Calculus I, II, III - Algebra I, II - ICT - Systems and Signals.
Experience with embedded systems and atmega micro controllers.
Experience with Motorola micro controllers

headline: Backend Developer
about:
I’m a software developer specialized in backend, with experience in diverse projects and a strong interest in continuous improvement, technical collaboration, and building robust, scalable, and well-structured solutions.

I'm driven by work environments that prioritize collaboration, goal orientation, code quality, and shared growth. I enjoy learning, optimizing processes, taking on technical challenges, and contributing to teams with a positive atmosphere—always valuing effective communication and professional commitment.

I work with technologies such as Java (Spring Boot), Go, Python (Django), JavaScript (Node.js, Express), Redis, MQTT, XMPP, Swagger/OpenAPI, and AI integrations. I have experience with relational and non-relational databases including PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, and Firebase. I’m passionate about open-source tools but also adapt easily to proprietary technologies.

I'm currently expanding my knowledge in Kubernetes, Kafka, and AWS as part of an ongoing learning journey focused on modern architectures and distributed systems.

headline: Diseñadora Gráfica | Administrativa & Back Office | CRM Expert.
about:
Soy una profesional multidisciplinaria con experiencia en diseño gráfico y gestión administrativa en entornos dinámicos. A lo largo de mi trayectoria, he desarrollado habilidades que combinan la creatividad con la organización, permitiéndome aportar soluciones visuales efectivas y optimizar procesos operativos.

En el área de diseño gráfico, me especializo en la creación de material visual para redes sociales, merchandising y estrategias de marketing, trabajando con herramientas como After Effects y CapCut. Mi enfoque está orientado a transmitir mensajes de manera impactante y coherente con la identidad de marca.

Paralelamente, mi experiencia en Back Office y soporte administrativo me ha permitido gestionar bases de datos, coordinar tareas operativas y colaborar con distintos departamentos para mejorar la eficiencia de los procesos internos. Tengo habilidades en gestión de CRM, data entry, elaboración de informes y soporte interdepartamental.

Me defino como una persona proactiva, organizada y con gran capacidad para adaptarme a nuevos desafíos. Disfruto aprender continuamente y aportar valor tanto en proyectos creativos como en la optimización de procesos administrativos.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
-Desarrollo de estrategias de marketing digital: administración de redes sociales y creación de campañas enfocadas en el crecimiento de la comunidad y la visibilidad de la tienda online.
-Branding y gestión de la imagen corporativa: desarrollo y ejecución de la estrategia de branding para mantener la consistencia visual y de mensaje en todos los puntos de contacto con el cliente.
-Diseño de merchandising: creación y desarrollo de productos promocionales personalizados que alinean con la identidad de la marca. Adaptación rápida a nuevas tendencias y preferencias, con propuestas creativas para nuevos productos visuales. 
-Gestión de proveedores: Coordinación con proveedores y revisión de materiales, garantizando alta calidad y consistencia visual.
-Producción de contenido multimedia: diseño de contenido audiovisual y fotográfico para campañas publicitarias, redes sociales y sitio web, asegurando la cohesión con la imagen de la marca.
-Optimización del sitio web: supervisión del diseño y la funcionalidad de la página web para mejorar la experiencia del usuario y aumentar la conversión de ventas.
-Gestión de ventas y operaciones: manejo de caja, control de inventario, procesamiento de pedidos y coordinación de la logística de envíos.

-Desarrollo de identidad visual y estrategias de marca.
-Gestión integral de redes sociales (planificación, creación de contenido, programación y análisis de métricas).
-Diseño y producción de posteos creativos para redes sociales enfocados en promocionar los servicios del centro de estética.
-Creación de flyers, carteles y tarjetas de presentación para campañas promocionales y eventos del centro.
-Producción de contenido fotográfico y audiovisual adaptado a la estrategia de comunicación.
-Coordinación y ejecución de campañas publicitarias digitales.

Durante mi trayectoria en Dynatac Phone, inicialmente desempeñé el rol de Teleoperadora en el área de ventas y ateción al cliente, especializándome en productos financieros y de telecomunicaciones. En los últimos años, evolucioné hacia un enfoque más administrativo como auxiliar administrativa y Back Office, donde combiné mis habilidades en ventas con tareas de soporte operativo y mantenimiento de bases de datos.

Responsabilidades:
Gestión de Ventas: Lideré campañas de ventas a través de llamadas en frío y seguimiento de clientes, superando objetivos mensuales y contribuyendo a la captación de nuevos clientes para tarjetas de crédito y servicios de telecomunicaciones.

Análisis y Evaluación de Riesgos: Realicé análisis crediticio y evaluación de riesgos conforme a normativas del BCRA, asegurando la correcta aprobación de productos financieros.

Negociación y Asesoramiento: Proporcioné asesoramiento proactivo a los clientes, adaptando soluciones a sus necesidades y promoviendo una experiencia positiva que fomentó la lealtad del cliente.

Gestión Administrativa: Brindé soporte en la gestión de documentación, facturación, pago a proveedores, conciliación bancaria y control de registros, asegurando la precisión y el mantenimiento actualizado de la información relevante para el área. Asistencia a estudio contable.

Mantenimiento de Bases de Datos: Desarrollé y mantuve bases de datos precisas utilizando sistemas de gestión (CRM), optimizando la organización de la información de clientes y facilitando el seguimiento de interacciones.

Data Entry y Control de Información: Ejecuté tareas de entrada de datos con altos estándares de precisión, garantizando la integridad de la información y contribuyendo a la mejora de la eficiencia operativa.

Análisis y Evaluación de Información: Realicé análisis de datos para la elaboración de reportes administrativos, facilitando la toma de decisiones informadas por parte del equipo de gestión.
skills: Control y gestión de bases de datos (CRM)

experience.description:
Socia fundadora emprendimiento de colaciones saludables. Proveedores, logística, marketing, branding, gestión de redes sociales y creación de contenidos fotográficos y audiovisuales.

element.headline: Diseñadora Gráfica | Administrativa & Back Office | CRM Expert.
element.about:
Soy una profesional multidisciplinaria con experiencia en diseño gráfico y gestión administrativa en entornos dinámicos. A lo largo de mi trayectoria, he desarrollado habilidades que combinan la creatividad con la organización, permitiéndome aportar soluciones visuales efectivas y optimizar procesos operativos.

En el área de diseño gráfico, me especializo en la creación de material visual para redes sociales, merchandising y estrategias de marketing, trabajando con herramientas como After Effects y CapCut. Mi enfoque está orientado a transmitir mensajes de manera impactante y coherente con la identidad de marca.

Paralelamente, mi experiencia en Back Office y soporte administrativo me ha permitido gestionar bases de datos, coordinar tareas operativas y colaborar con distintos departamentos para mejorar la eficiencia de los procesos internos. Tengo habilidades en gestión de CRM, data entry, elaboración de informes y soporte interdepartamental.

Me defino como una persona proactiva, organizada y con gran capacidad para adaptarme a nuevos desafíos. Disfruto aprender continuamente y aportar valor tanto en proyectos creativos como en la optimización de procesos administrativos.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
-Desarrollo de estrategias de marketing digital: administración de redes sociales y creación de campañas enfocadas en el crecimiento de la comunidad y la visibilidad de la tienda online.
-Branding y gestión de la imagen corporativa: desarrollo y ejecución de la estrategia de branding para mantener la consistencia visual y de mensaje en todos los puntos de contacto con el cliente.
-Diseño de merchandising: creación y desarrollo de productos promocionales personalizados que alinean con la identidad de la marca. Adaptación rápida a nuevas tendencias y preferencias, con propuestas creativas para nuevos productos visuales. 
-Gestión de proveedores: Coordinación con proveedores y revisión de materiales, garantizando alta calidad y consistencia visual.
-Producción de contenido multimedia: diseño de contenido audiovisual y fotográfico para campañas publicitarias, redes sociales y sitio web, asegurando la cohesión con la imagen de la marca.
-Optimización del sitio web: supervisión del diseño y la funcionalidad de la página web para mejorar la experiencia del usuario y aumentar la conversión de ventas.
-Gestión de ventas y operaciones: manejo de caja, control de inventario, procesamiento de pedidos y coordinación de la logística de envíos.

-Desarrollo de identidad visual y estrategias de marca.
-Gestión integral de redes sociales (planificación, creación de contenido, programación y análisis de métricas).
-Diseño y producción de posteos creativos para redes sociales enfocados en promocionar los servicios del centro de estética.
-Creación de flyers, carteles y tarjetas de presentación para campañas promocionales y eventos del centro.
-Producción de contenido fotográfico y audiovisual adaptado a la estrategia de comunicación.
-Coordinación y ejecución de campañas publicitarias digitales.

Durante mi trayectoria en Dynatac Phone, inicialmente desempeñé el rol de Teleoperadora en el área de ventas y ateción al cliente, especializándome en productos financieros y de telecomunicaciones. En los últimos años, evolucioné hacia un enfoque más administrativo como auxiliar administrativa y Back Office, donde combiné mis habilidades en ventas con tareas de soporte operativo y mantenimiento de bases de datos.

Responsabilidades:
Gestión de Ventas: Lideré campañas de ventas a través de llamadas en frío y seguimiento de clientes, superando objetivos mensuales y contribuyendo a la captación de nuevos clientes para tarjetas de crédito y servicios de telecomunicaciones.

Análisis y Evaluación de Riesgos: Realicé análisis crediticio y evaluación de riesgos conforme a normativas del BCRA, asegurando la correcta aprobación de productos financieros.

Negociación y Asesoramiento: Proporcioné asesoramiento proactivo a los clientes, adaptando soluciones a sus necesidades y promoviendo una experiencia positiva que fomentó la lealtad del cliente.

Gestión Administrativa: Brindé soporte en la gestión de documentación, facturación, pago a proveedores, conciliación bancaria y control de registros, asegurando la precisión y el mantenimiento actualizado de la información relevante para el área. Asistencia a estudio contable.

Mantenimiento de Bases de Datos: Desarrollé y mantuve bases de datos precisas utilizando sistemas de gestión (CRM), optimizando la organización de la información de clientes y facilitando el seguimiento de interacciones.

Data Entry y Control de Información: Ejecuté tareas de entrada de datos con altos estándares de precisión, garantizando la integridad de la información y contribuyendo a la mejora de la eficiencia operativa.

Análisis y Evaluación de Información: Realicé análisis de datos para la elaboración de reportes administrativos, facilitando la toma de decisiones informadas por parte del equipo de gestión.
skills: Control y gestión de bases de datos (CRM)

volunteering.description: Miembro del Grupo Juvenil la Catedral, 5 años como patrullera recibiendo formación, 4 años como formadora y un año como presidente coordinadora de los 38 formadores. Movimiento Católico formado por 500 miembros adolescentes entre los 12 y 19 años. La formación se da durante todos los sábados del año y dos campamentos, uno en vacaciones de invierno de 4 días y uno en verano de 11 días de duración.

Miembro activo del movimiento brindando retiros de impacto cátolicos para jóvenes de 17 a 24 años brindando formaciones, testimonios y dinámicas para reflexionar sobre la realidad, los valores, el proyecto de vida y las creencias.

headline: Tech Lead @Cobee
about:
I am a software engineer with over 7 years of professional experience who enjoys facing new challenges and come up with creative solutions that exceed the expectations.

I have experience organizing teams with agile methodology and I am interested in continue developing myself as a servant leader, enabling my team to continuously deliver value and quality to the customers.

I have a proactive attitude, ability for interpersonal relationships and good predisposition for teamwork.

experience.description:
As a member of the Customer Delivery & Implementation team I am responsible for ensuring that ASAPP products are delivered to customers on time. My focus is set on achieving high scalability for ASAPP's implementation process, maximizing the number of new clients and minimizing the engineering effort to do it.
I successfully performed this role reporting to New York's office.

As a member of the Partner Integrations team I worked closely to the client facing teams to customize ASAPP’s product to fit each partner specific needs. I successfully performed this role remotely working and reporting to New York’s office.

As Scrum Master of a team in the Data Agile Release Train I was in charge of facilitating the team ceremonies, including daily stand up, sprint planning, backlog refining, sprint retrospective and sprint review where the progress done by the team was presented to clients and customers. I helped in the removal of any roadblocks that the team may encounter and worked side by side with a Product Owner to ensure the work is correctly defined, clearly scoped and the commitments of every sprint were completed successfully. Additionally, to continue to improve my technical abilities I also worked with the development team on the daily work, staying up to date with the latest developments strategies using C# and Microsoft Azure as Cloud provider.

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description: As a member of the Data Agile Release Train I was involved in the development of PaaS hosted on Azure Cloud integrating CI/CD practices using Azure DevOps. All this was done following the Agile methodologies and working collaborative among multiple team using SAFe framework. The main technologies used were C\#, relational and NoSQL databases and multiple Azure services.

As a member of the Seismic Information Management team I was in charge of finding automation opportunities inside the daily workflow, develop or delegate the developing of those automations and present the results to both medium and high level management.

Nominated to Young Talents session and presented my work to the VP of IT.

element.headline: Tech Lead @Cobee
element.about:
I am a software engineer with over 7 years of professional experience who enjoys facing new challenges and come up with creative solutions that exceed the expectations.

I have experience organizing teams with agile methodology and I am interested in continue developing myself as a servant leader, enabling my team to continuously deliver value and quality to the customers.

I have a proactive attitude, ability for interpersonal relationships and good predisposition for teamwork.

experience.description:
As a member of the Customer Delivery & Implementation team I am responsible for ensuring that ASAPP products are delivered to customers on time. My focus is set on achieving high scalability for ASAPP's implementation process, maximizing the number of new clients and minimizing the engineering effort to do it.
I successfully performed this role reporting to New York's office.

As a member of the Partner Integrations team I worked closely to the client facing teams to customize ASAPP’s product to fit each partner specific needs. I successfully performed this role remotely working and reporting to New York’s office.

As Scrum Master of a team in the Data Agile Release Train I was in charge of facilitating the team ceremonies, including daily stand up, sprint planning, backlog refining, sprint retrospective and sprint review where the progress done by the team was presented to clients and customers. I helped in the removal of any roadblocks that the team may encounter and worked side by side with a Product Owner to ensure the work is correctly defined, clearly scoped and the commitments of every sprint were completed successfully. Additionally, to continue to improve my technical abilities I also worked with the development team on the daily work, staying up to date with the latest developments strategies using C# and Microsoft Azure as Cloud provider.

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description: As a member of the Data Agile Release Train I was involved in the development of PaaS hosted on Azure Cloud integrating CI/CD practices using Azure DevOps. All this was done following the Agile methodologies and working collaborative among multiple team using SAFe framework. The main technologies used were C\#, relational and NoSQL databases and multiple Azure services.

As a member of the Seismic Information Management team I was in charge of finding automation opportunities inside the daily workflow, develop or delegate the developing of those automations and present the results to both medium and high level management.

Nominated to Young Talents session and presented my work to the VP of IT.

about:
Estudiante de Doctorado en la Universidad Politécnica de Valencia. Investigando sobre temas relacionados con Machine Learning aplicado a la arquitectura de los procesadores. Diseño y análisis de sistemas de memoria hibrida en simuladores. Implementación de técnicas de prefetch. Diseño de planificadores dinámicos en sistemas con procesadores heterogéneos Intel.

Analista Programador Junior (I+D) en EDICOM

PhD student at the Polytechnic University of Valencia. Researching on topics related to Machine Learning applied to processor architecture. Design and analysis of hybrid memory systems in simulators. Implementation of prefetch techniques. Design of dynamic schedulers in systems with heterogeneous Intel processors.

Junior Programming Analyst (I+D) in EDICOM

projects.title: Extension of the MUSCOP protocol to tolerate failures in the lead drone during flight.
projects.associatedWith: Associated with Universitat Politècnica de València (UPV)
projects.description: Goal: MUSCOP is a drone control protocol based on Slaves UAVs that follows a Master UAV (Center) in the course of an air mission. The current problem with this protocol is that if the master drone fails, the other drones do not finish the mission. Our proposal consists of an extension of this protocol to tolerate failures in the master drone, in order to permit the remaining drones to complete the mission.

publications.title: Diseño de un controlador de memoria principal híbrido para aplicaciones de Big Data
publications.publishedAt: Congreso Nacional de Informática 2023, Jornadas SARTECO ISBN-13: 978-84-09-54466-0 · Sep 22, 2023
publications.description:
La tecnología de memoria DRAM ha sido la dominante en las implementaciones del subsistema de memoria. En los últimos años, e impulsada principalmente por las enormes demandas de memoria de las aplicaciones de big data, la tecnología NVRAM ha emergido como una tecnología de memoria más densa, permitiendo el diseño de nuevas jerarquías de memoria híbridas DRAM/NVRAM que combinan múltiples tecnologías de memoria para equilibrar capacidad, latencia, coste y persistencia.
En el diseño de jerarquías de memoria híbridas se están aplicando dos enfoques principales: el enfoque de espacio de direcciones híbrido DRAM/NVRAM, que confía en el programador o el sistema operativo para elegir la tecnología de memoria en la que debe almacenarse cada página de memoria; y el enfoque de espacio de direcciones (único) NVRAM, en el que se necesita una tecnología más rápida (por ej., DRAM convencional) que actúe como caché de la NVRAM para aumentar las prestaciones. Este enfoque presenta retos arquitectónicos como la organización de metadatos.
En contraste con los enfoques existentes, este trabajo propone un controlador de memoria que aprovecha tecnologías de memoria recientes como eDRAM y MRAM para mejorar las prestaciones de la lenta memoria NVRAM cuando actúa como memoria principal. La propuesta consiste en una jerarquía de caché de dos niveles en el controlador de memoria: una caché de sectores SRAM y una caché (x)RAM. La caché (x)RAM, mucho más densa, ayuda a reducir significativamente el número de accesos a la NVRAM. Los resultados experimentales demuestran que la implementación de la caché (x)RAM con eDRAM o MRAM es el método más eficaz. Además, la eDRAM es capaz de mejorar la penalización en caso de fallo de la caché SRAM hasta en un 50% y un 80%, y las prestaciones globales del sistema en un 15% y un 23%.

publications.title: Main memory controller with multiple media technologies for big data workloads
publications.publishedAt: Journal of Big Data DOI 10.1186/s40537-023-00761-0 · May 22, 2023
publications.description: SRAM and DRAM memory technologies have been dominant in the implementations of memory subsystems. In recent years, and mainly driven by the huge memory demands of big data applications, NVRAM technology has emerged as a denser memory technology, enabling the design of new hybrid DRAM/NVRAM memory hierarchies that combine multiple memory media technologies to balance memory capacity, latency, cost, and endurance. Two main approaches are being applied to the design of hybrid memory hierarchies: the hybrid address space approach, which relies on the programmer or the operating system to choose the memory technology where each memory page should be stored; and the (only) NVM address space approach, where a faster technology (e.g. commodity DRAM) is needed to acts as a cache of NVRAM to boost the performance. This approach presents architectural challenges such the organization of metadata (e.g. cache tags) and the selection of the proper technology for each memory component. In contrast to existing approaches, this work proposes a memory controller that leverages novel memory technologies such as eDRAM and MRAM to mitigate NVRAM bus contention and improve the performance of the NVM address space. The devised solution proposes a two-level cache hierarchy in the memory controller: a SRAM sector cache and a (x)RAM cache. The (x)RAM cache, much denser, helps signifcantly reduce the number of accesses to NVRAM. Experimental results show that implementing the (x)RAM cache with eDRAM or MRAM is the best performing approach. Moreover, the eRAM is able to improve the SRAM cache miss penalty by up to 50% and 80%, and overall system performance by 15% and 23%.

publications.title: Predicting Isolated Performance From Multicore Execution Using Machine Learning (POSTER)
publications.publishedAt: 37th IEEE International Parallel & Distributed Processing Symposium DOI 10.1109/ipdpsw59300.2023.00160 · May 15, 2023
publications.description: IPDPS 2023 PhD Forum presenter in Florida, USA.

publications.title: Diseño y uso de redes neuronales para estimar las prestaciones en solitario de las aplicaciones
publications.publishedAt: Congreso Nacional de Informática 2022, Jornadas SARTECO ISBN-13: 978-84-1302-185-0 · Sep 21, 2022
publications.description: Cuando varias aplicaciones se ejecutan concurrentemente en un computador con recursos compartidos, como las caches de último nivel o la memoria principal, se producen pérdidas de prestaciones por la interferencia entre aplicaciones en el uso de estos recursos respecto a su ejecución en solitario. Para reducir estas pérdidas, se han diseñado políticas para gestionar estos recursos (por ej., políticas de reparticionando del espacio de cache o de configuración de la prebúsqueda hardware). Un importante desafío en diferentes ámbitos, como la nube o los sistemas de tiempo real, es predecir cómo la acción de una determinada política afectaría a las prestaciones de cada aplicaciones antes de realizarla. Este trabajo presenta una propuesta basada en redes neuronales que, a partir de datos obtenidos por una aplicación en ejecución concurrente con otras aplicaciones, estima las prestaciones que tendría una aplicación en solitario. Los resultados experimentales muestran que la propuesta se adapta dinámicamente a los cambios en el comportamiento de las aplicaciones de la carga. Las prestaciones estimadas presentan, de media, un error del 11,7% y del 2,3% para las métricas MAPE y MSE, respectivamente.

publications.title: A Neural Network to Estimate Isolated Performance from Multi-Program Execution.
publications.publishedAt: 30th Euromicro International Conference on Parallel, Distributed and Network-based Processing DOI 10.1109/PDP55904.2022.00018 · Mar 11, 2022
publications.description: When multiple applications are running on a platform with shared resources like multicore CPUs, the behaviour of the running application can be altered by the co-runners. In this case, the system resources need to be managed (e.g.by repartitioning the cache space, re-schedule applications in distinct cores, modifying the prefetcher configuration, etc.) to reduce the inter-application interference in order to minimize the performance losses over isolated execution. In this context, a mainchallenge in different computing scenarios like the public cloud or soft real-time systems is knowing the performance impact ofa given management action on each application with respect to its isolated execution. With this aim, in this work we present a neural network-based approach that estimates the performance an application would have had in isolation from multi-program executions. Experimental results show that the proposal dynamically adapts to changes in application behavior. On average, the predicted performance presents an error deviation by 11.7% and 2.3% for MAPE and MSE respectively.

publications.title: DeepP: Deep Learning Multi-Program Prefetch Configuration for the IBM POWER 8
publications.publishedAt: IEEE Transactions on Computers DOI 10.1109/TC.2021.3139997 · Jan 4, 2022
publications.description: Current multi-core processors implement sophisticated hardware prefetchers, that can be configured by application (PID),to improve the system performance. When running multiple applications, each application can present different prefetch requirements,hence different configurations can be used. Setting the optimal prefetch configuration for each application is a complex task since itdoes not only depend on the application characteristics but also on the interference at the shared memory resources (e.g. memorybandwidth). In his paper, we proposeDeepP, a deep learning approach for the IBM POWER8 that identifies at run-time the bestprefetch configuration for each application in a workload. To this end, the neural network predicts the performance of each applicationunder the studied prefetch configurations by using a set of performance events. The prediction accuracy of the network is improvedthanks to a dynamic training methodology that allows learning the impact of dynamic changes of the prefetch configuration onperformance. At run-time, the devised network infers the best prefetch configuration for each application and adjusts it dynamically.Experimental results show that the proposed approach improves performance, on average, by 5,8%, 6,7%, and 15,8% compared tothe default prefetch configuration across different 6-, 8-, and 10-application workloads, respectively.

publications.title: Configuración de prefetch para cargas multiprograma mediante aprendizaje profundo
publications.publishedAt: Congreso Nacional de Informática 2021, Jornadas SARTECO ISBN-13: 978-84-09-32487-3 · Sep 24, 2021
publications.description: Los procesadores multinúcleo actuales implementan prefetchers hardware sofisticados, que se pueden configurar por software, para mejorar el rendimiento del sistema. Esto es especialmente útil cuando se ejecutan varias aplicaciones concurrentemente. Dado que cada aplicación puede presentar diferentes requisitos de prebúsqueda, esto permite asignar una configuración diferente a cada una de ellas. Sin embargo, establecer la configuración óptima de prebúsqueda para cada aplicación es una tarea compleja, ya que no solo depende de las características de la aplicación en cuestión, sino que también de la interferencia en los recursos de memoria compartidos (por ejemplo, ancho de banda de memoria). En este artículo, proponemos DeepP, un enfoque de aprendizaje profundo para el IBM POWER8 que identifica en tiempo de ejecución la mejor configuración de prebúsqueda para cada aplicación en una carga de trabajo. Para este fin, la red neuronal predice el rendimiento de cada aplicación bajo las configuraciones de prebúsqueda estudiadas mediante el uso de un conjunto de eventos de prestaciones. La precisión de la predicción de la red se mejora gracias a una metodología de entrenamiento dinámico que permite aprender el impacto de los cambios dinámicos de la configuración de prebúsqueda en las prestaciones. En tiempo de ejecución, la red propuesta infiere la mejor configuración de prebúsqueda para cada aplicación y la ajusta dinámicamente. Los resultados experimentales muestran que la propuesta mejora las prestaciones, en promedio, en un 5,8% y 15,8% en comparación con la configuración predeterminada de prebúsqueda en diferentes cargas de trabajo de 6 y 10 aplicaciones, respectivamente.

publications.title: TFM - DeepP: Deep Learning Multi-Program Prefetch Configuration for the IBM POWER 8
publications.publishedAt: Universitat Politècnica de Valencia · Sep 28, 2020
publications.description: The most modern high-performance processors integrate very complex hardware prefetchers, in which selecting the configuration to obtain the best performance becomes a complex task. Additionally, in workloads consisting of multiple applications running concurrently these tasks are further complicated. This is mainly due to the sharing of shared resources within the processor (especially the bandwidth of main memory). Recently there has been a notable increase in neural network applications thanks to new deep learning techniques, a new type of machine learning that has been made possible by increased computing power and the use of multilayer neural networks, which act as universal approximators that allow you to model nonlinear relationships between input and output data. This study aims to use the aforementioned neural network techniques to dynamically predict (at runtime) the best configuration of the prefecher to obtain maximum performance in multiprogram loads, using an IBM POWER8 processor that has a prefetcher with a high (2 high to 25) possible configurations.

publications.title: Providing resilience to UAV swarms following planned missions
publications.publishedAt: 2020 29th International Conference on Computer Communications and Networks (ICCCN) DOI 10.1109/ICCCN49398.2020.9209634 · Aug 10, 2020
publications.description: As we experience an unprecedented growth in the field of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs), more and more applications keep arising due to the combination of low cost and flexibility provided by these flying devices, especially those of the multirrotor type. Within this field, solutions where several UAVs team-up to create a swarm are gaining momentum as they enable to perform more sophisticated tasks, or accelerate task execution compared to the single-UAV alternative. However, advanced solutions based on UAV swarms still lack significant advancements and validation in real environments to facilitate their adoption and deployment. In this paper we take a step ahead in this direction by proposing a solution that improves the resilience of swarm flights, focusing on handling the loss of the swarm leader, which is typically the most critical condition to be faced. Experiments using our UAV emulation tool (ArduSim) evidence the correctness of the protocol under adverse circumstances, and highlight that swarm members are able to seamlessly switch to an alternative leader when necessary, introducing a negligible delay in the process in most cases, while keeping this delay within a few seconds even in worst-case conditions.

publications.title: TFG - Mejorar las prestaciones del prefetcher utilizando técnicas de deep learning
publications.publishedAt: Universitat Politècnica de València · Oct 8, 2019
publications.description:
ES: Recientemente ha habido un gran incremento de aplicaciones de las redes neuronales gracias a nuevas técnicas de aprendizaje profundo (deep learning), un nuevo tipo de aprendizaje automático que ha sido posible gracias al incremento de la capacidad de cómputo y del uso de redes neuronales multicapa, las cuales actúan como aproximadores universales que permiten modelar relaciones no lineales entre datos de entrada y salida. En este proyecto se pretenden aprovechar las redes neuronales y el aprendizaje profundo para predecir qué configuración de la prebúsqueda maximiza las prestaciones de un sistema ejecutando aplicaciones. De esta manera, será posible establecer un modelo basado en redes neuronales que prediga la configuración del prefetcher más adecuada para cada aplicación.

EN: Recently there has been a large increase in applications of neural networks thanks to new deep learning techniques, a new type of machine learning that has been possible thanks to the increase in computing capacity and the use of multilayer neural networks, which act as universal approximators that allow modeling nonlinear relationships between input and output data. This project aims to use neural networks and deep learning to predict which pre-search configuration maximizes system performance by running applications. In this way, it will be possible to establish a model based on neural networks that predicts the most appropriate prefetcher configuration for each application.

projects.title: Extension of the MUSCOP protocol to tolerate failures in the lead drone during flight.
projects.associatedWith: Associated with Universitat Politècnica de València (UPV)
projects.description: Goal: MUSCOP is a drone control protocol based on Slaves UAVs that follows a Master UAV (Center) in the course of an air mission. The current problem with this protocol is that if the master drone fails, the other drones do not finish the mission. Our proposal consists of an extension of this protocol to tolerate failures in the master drone, in order to permit the remaining drones to complete the mission.

publications.title: Diseño de un controlador de memoria principal híbrido para aplicaciones de Big Data
publications.publishedAt: Congreso Nacional de Informática 2023, Jornadas SARTECO ISBN-13: 978-84-09-54466-0 · Sep 22, 2023
publications.description:
La tecnología de memoria DRAM ha sido la dominante en las implementaciones del subsistema de memoria. En los últimos años, e impulsada principalmente por las enormes demandas de memoria de las aplicaciones de big data, la tecnología NVRAM ha emergido como una tecnología de memoria más densa, permitiendo el diseño de nuevas jerarquías de memoria híbridas DRAM/NVRAM que combinan múltiples tecnologías de memoria para equilibrar capacidad, latencia, coste y persistencia.
En el diseño de jerarquías de memoria híbridas se están aplicando dos enfoques principales: el enfoque de espacio de direcciones híbrido DRAM/NVRAM, que confía en el programador o el sistema operativo para elegir la tecnología de memoria en la que debe almacenarse cada página de memoria; y el enfoque de espacio de direcciones (único) NVRAM, en el que se necesita una tecnología más rápida (por ej., DRAM convencional) que actúe como caché de la NVRAM para aumentar las prestaciones. Este enfoque presenta retos arquitectónicos como la organización de metadatos.
En contraste con los enfoques existentes, este trabajo propone un controlador de memoria que aprovecha tecnologías de memoria recientes como eDRAM y MRAM para mejorar las prestaciones de la lenta memoria NVRAM cuando actúa como memoria principal. La propuesta consiste en una jerarquía de caché de dos niveles en el controlador de memoria: una caché de sectores SRAM y una caché (x)RAM. La caché (x)RAM, mucho más densa, ayuda a reducir significativamente el número de accesos a la NVRAM. Los resultados experimentales demuestran que la implementación de la caché (x)RAM con eDRAM o MRAM es el método más eficaz. Además, la eDRAM es capaz de mejorar la penalización en caso de fallo de la caché SRAM hasta en un 50% y un 80%, y las prestaciones globales del sistema en un 15% y un 23%.

publications.title: Main memory controller with multiple media technologies for big data workloads
publications.publishedAt: Journal of Big Data DOI 10.1186/s40537-023-00761-0 · May 22, 2023
publications.description: SRAM and DRAM memory technologies have been dominant in the implementations of memory subsystems. In recent years, and mainly driven by the huge memory demands of big data applications, NVRAM technology has emerged as a denser memory technology, enabling the design of new hybrid DRAM/NVRAM memory hierarchies that combine multiple memory media technologies to balance memory capacity, latency, cost, and endurance. Two main approaches are being applied to the design of hybrid memory hierarchies: the hybrid address space approach, which relies on the programmer or the operating system to choose the memory technology where each memory page should be stored; and the (only) NVM address space approach, where a faster technology (e.g. commodity DRAM) is needed to acts as a cache of NVRAM to boost the performance. This approach presents architectural challenges such the organization of metadata (e.g. cache tags) and the selection of the proper technology for each memory component. In contrast to existing approaches, this work proposes a memory controller that leverages novel memory technologies such as eDRAM and MRAM to mitigate NVRAM bus contention and improve the performance of the NVM address space. The devised solution proposes a two-level cache hierarchy in the memory controller: a SRAM sector cache and a (x)RAM cache. The (x)RAM cache, much denser, helps signifcantly reduce the number of accesses to NVRAM. Experimental results show that implementing the (x)RAM cache with eDRAM or MRAM is the best performing approach. Moreover, the eRAM is able to improve the SRAM cache miss penalty by up to 50% and 80%, and overall system performance by 15% and 23%.

publications.title: Predicting Isolated Performance From Multicore Execution Using Machine Learning (POSTER)
publications.publishedAt: 37th IEEE International Parallel & Distributed Processing Symposium DOI 10.1109/ipdpsw59300.2023.00160 · May 15, 2023
publications.description: IPDPS 2023 PhD Forum presenter in Florida, USA.

publications.title: Diseño y uso de redes neuronales para estimar las prestaciones en solitario de las aplicaciones
publications.publishedAt: Congreso Nacional de Informática 2022, Jornadas SARTECO ISBN-13: 978-84-1302-185-0 · Sep 21, 2022
publications.description: Cuando varias aplicaciones se ejecutan concurrentemente en un computador con recursos compartidos, como las caches de último nivel o la memoria principal, se producen pérdidas de prestaciones por la interferencia entre aplicaciones en el uso de estos recursos respecto a su ejecución en solitario. Para reducir estas pérdidas, se han diseñado políticas para gestionar estos recursos (por ej., políticas de reparticionando del espacio de cache o de configuración de la prebúsqueda hardware). Un importante desafío en diferentes ámbitos, como la nube o los sistemas de tiempo real, es predecir cómo la acción de una determinada política afectaría a las prestaciones de cada aplicaciones antes de realizarla. Este trabajo presenta una propuesta basada en redes neuronales que, a partir de datos obtenidos por una aplicación en ejecución concurrente con otras aplicaciones, estima las prestaciones que tendría una aplicación en solitario. Los resultados experimentales muestran que la propuesta se adapta dinámicamente a los cambios en el comportamiento de las aplicaciones de la carga. Las prestaciones estimadas presentan, de media, un error del 11,7% y del 2,3% para las métricas MAPE y MSE, respectivamente.

publications.title: DeepP: Deep Learning Prefetch Configuration (POSTER)
publications.publishedAt: ACACES 2022 Summer School organized by HiPEAC · Jul 13, 2022
publications.description: Poster for ACACES 2022 Summer School organized by HiPEAC in Fiuggi, Italy.

publications.publishedAt: ACACES 2022 Summer School organized by HiPEAC · Jul 13, 2022
publications.description: Abstract for ACACES 2022 Summer School organized by HiPEAC in Fiuggi, Italy.

publications.title: A Neural Network to Estimate Isolated Performance from Multi-Program Execution.
publications.publishedAt: 30th Euromicro International Conference on Parallel, Distributed and Network-based Processing DOI 10.1109/PDP55904.2022.00018 · Mar 11, 2022
publications.description: When multiple applications are running on a platform with shared resources like multicore CPUs, the behaviour of the running application can be altered by the co-runners. In this case, the system resources need to be managed (e.g.by repartitioning the cache space, re-schedule applications in distinct cores, modifying the prefetcher configuration, etc.) to reduce the inter-application interference in order to minimize the performance losses over isolated execution. In this context, a mainchallenge in different computing scenarios like the public cloud or soft real-time systems is knowing the performance impact ofa given management action on each application with respect to its isolated execution. With this aim, in this work we present a neural network-based approach that estimates the performance an application would have had in isolation from multi-program executions. Experimental results show that the proposal dynamically adapts to changes in application behavior. On average, the predicted performance presents an error deviation by 11.7% and 2.3% for MAPE and MSE respectively.

publications.title: DeepP: Deep Learning Multi-Program Prefetch Configuration for the IBM POWER 8
publications.publishedAt: IEEE Transactions on Computers DOI 10.1109/TC.2021.3139997 · Jan 4, 2022
publications.description: Current multi-core processors implement sophisticated hardware prefetchers, that can be configured by application (PID),to improve the system performance. When running multiple applications, each application can present different prefetch requirements,hence different configurations can be used. Setting the optimal prefetch configuration for each application is a complex task since itdoes not only depend on the application characteristics but also on the interference at the shared memory resources (e.g. memorybandwidth). In his paper, we proposeDeepP, a deep learning approach for the IBM POWER8 that identifies at run-time the bestprefetch configuration for each application in a workload. To this end, the neural network predicts the performance of each applicationunder the studied prefetch configurations by using a set of performance events. The prediction accuracy of the network is improvedthanks to a dynamic training methodology that allows learning the impact of dynamic changes of the prefetch configuration onperformance. At run-time, the devised network infers the best prefetch configuration for each application and adjusts it dynamically.Experimental results show that the proposed approach improves performance, on average, by 5,8%, 6,7%, and 15,8% compared tothe default prefetch configuration across different 6-, 8-, and 10-application workloads, respectively.

publications.title: Configuración de prefetch para cargas multiprograma mediante aprendizaje profundo
publications.publishedAt: Congreso Nacional de Informática 2021, Jornadas SARTECO ISBN-13: 978-84-09-32487-3 · Sep 24, 2021
publications.description: Los procesadores multinúcleo actuales implementan prefetchers hardware sofisticados, que se pueden configurar por software, para mejorar el rendimiento del sistema. Esto es especialmente útil cuando se ejecutan varias aplicaciones concurrentemente. Dado que cada aplicación puede presentar diferentes requisitos de prebúsqueda, esto permite asignar una configuración diferente a cada una de ellas. Sin embargo, establecer la configuración óptima de prebúsqueda para cada aplicación es una tarea compleja, ya que no solo depende de las características de la aplicación en cuestión, sino que también de la interferencia en los recursos de memoria compartidos (por ejemplo, ancho de banda de memoria). En este artículo, proponemos DeepP, un enfoque de aprendizaje profundo para el IBM POWER8 que identifica en tiempo de ejecución la mejor configuración de prebúsqueda para cada aplicación en una carga de trabajo. Para este fin, la red neuronal predice el rendimiento de cada aplicación bajo las configuraciones de prebúsqueda estudiadas mediante el uso de un conjunto de eventos de prestaciones. La precisión de la predicción de la red se mejora gracias a una metodología de entrenamiento dinámico que permite aprender el impacto de los cambios dinámicos de la configuración de prebúsqueda en las prestaciones. En tiempo de ejecución, la red propuesta infiere la mejor configuración de prebúsqueda para cada aplicación y la ajusta dinámicamente. Los resultados experimentales muestran que la propuesta mejora las prestaciones, en promedio, en un 5,8% y 15,8% en comparación con la configuración predeterminada de prebúsqueda en diferentes cargas de trabajo de 6 y 10 aplicaciones, respectivamente.

publications.title: TFM - DeepP: Deep Learning Multi-Program Prefetch Configuration for the IBM POWER 8
publications.publishedAt: Universitat Politècnica de Valencia · Sep 28, 2020
publications.description: The most modern high-performance processors integrate very complex hardware prefetchers, in which selecting the configuration to obtain the best performance becomes a complex task. Additionally, in workloads consisting of multiple applications running concurrently these tasks are further complicated. This is mainly due to the sharing of shared resources within the processor (especially the bandwidth of main memory). Recently there has been a notable increase in neural network applications thanks to new deep learning techniques, a new type of machine learning that has been made possible by increased computing power and the use of multilayer neural networks, which act as universal approximators that allow you to model nonlinear relationships between input and output data. This study aims to use the aforementioned neural network techniques to dynamically predict (at runtime) the best configuration of the prefecher to obtain maximum performance in multiprogram loads, using an IBM POWER8 processor that has a prefetcher with a high (2 high to 25) possible configurations.

publications.title: Providing resilience to UAV swarms following planned missions
publications.publishedAt: 2020 29th International Conference on Computer Communications and Networks (ICCCN) DOI 10.1109/ICCCN49398.2020.9209634 · Aug 10, 2020
publications.description: As we experience an unprecedented growth in the field of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs), more and more applications keep arising due to the combination of low cost and flexibility provided by these flying devices, especially those of the multirrotor type. Within this field, solutions where several UAVs team-up to create a swarm are gaining momentum as they enable to perform more sophisticated tasks, or accelerate task execution compared to the single-UAV alternative. However, advanced solutions based on UAV swarms still lack significant advancements and validation in real environments to facilitate their adoption and deployment. In this paper we take a step ahead in this direction by proposing a solution that improves the resilience of swarm flights, focusing on handling the loss of the swarm leader, which is typically the most critical condition to be faced. Experiments using our UAV emulation tool (ArduSim) evidence the correctness of the protocol under adverse circumstances, and highlight that swarm members are able to seamlessly switch to an alternative leader when necessary, introducing a negligible delay in the process in most cases, while keeping this delay within a few seconds even in worst-case conditions.

publications.title: TFG - Mejorar las prestaciones del prefetcher utilizando técnicas de deep learning
publications.publishedAt: Universitat Politècnica de València · Oct 8, 2019
publications.description:
ES: Recientemente ha habido un gran incremento de aplicaciones de las redes neuronales gracias a nuevas técnicas de aprendizaje profundo (deep learning), un nuevo tipo de aprendizaje automático que ha sido posible gracias al incremento de la capacidad de cómputo y del uso de redes neuronales multicapa, las cuales actúan como aproximadores universales que permiten modelar relaciones no lineales entre datos de entrada y salida. En este proyecto se pretenden aprovechar las redes neuronales y el aprendizaje profundo para predecir qué configuración de la prebúsqueda maximiza las prestaciones de un sistema ejecutando aplicaciones. De esta manera, será posible establecer un modelo basado en redes neuronales que prediga la configuración del prefetcher más adecuada para cada aplicación.

EN: Recently there has been a large increase in applications of neural networks thanks to new deep learning techniques, a new type of machine learning that has been possible thanks to the increase in computing capacity and the use of multilayer neural networks, which act as universal approximators that allow modeling nonlinear relationships between input and output data. This project aims to use neural networks and deep learning to predict which pre-search configuration maximizes system performance by running applications. In this way, it will be possible to establish a model based on neural networks that predicts the most appropriate prefetcher configuration for each application.

element.headline: Brand Ambassador/ Estratega Comercial con Gusto por el Buen Vino y los Grandes Resultados
element.about:
Creativo, resolutivo, estratégico y emprendedor, con un marcado perfil comercial.

"El vino es mi gran pasión, y me dedico a profundizar en su conocimiento a través de viajes, catas, estudio y compartiendo experiencias. Me considero un comunicador nato, y disfruto inspirando, formando y motivando a quienes me rodean, tanto en el ámbito personal como profesional. Creo firmemente en el poder del trabajo en equipo para alcanzar el éxito en cualquier proyecto."

profileTopEducation.schoolName: Universidad de Ciencias Empresariales y Sociales

experience.description: Mi objetivo es dar a conocer nuestra plataforma digital de venta colaborativa, acercándola a bodegas, distribuidores y retailers que buscan optimizar sus procesos comerciales, conectando mejor con el mercado actual.
skills: Industria del vino y de bebidas alcohólicas

experience.location: Houston y alrededores, Texas, Estados Unidos
experience.description: Working with the company to improve its presence in social media channels. Building and engaging communities for brand and product awareness.

Fundador de la agencia. A cargo de la estrategia de comunicación y posicionamiento de distintas empresas, productos y personas, con el objetivo de conectar a los consumidores/clientes con sus respectivas marcas y productos.

Servicios de la agencia: community management, social media strategy, SEO/SEM, prospección de nuevos mercados, organización de eventos en redes sociales, generación de contenidos, email marketing e e-commerce.

Sales Manager 
La Guashira | Valencia, Spain

Headline
Experienced Sales Manager now driving growth in the specialty coffee industry. Passionate about curating exceptional coffee experiences and building lasting relationships with discerning customers.

Summary
Results-oriented Sales Manager with a deep understanding of the specialty coffee market. 

Skilled in developing and executing innovative marketing strategies, building strong partnerships with coffee shops, restaurants, and hotels to expand distribution channels, and delivering exceptional customer service. 

Committed to promoting the art and science of coffee, driving sustainable growth in the industry, and identifying emerging opportunities to stay ahead of industry developments.

Skills
> Specialty coffee knowledge
> Marketing strategy
> Sales management
> Customer relationship management
> Event planning
> Sustainability
> Negotiation
> Quality control
> Coffee cupping
> Industry networking
Dueño y gerente del bar, donde implementamos una variada oferta de vinos por copa con tapeo, y desarrollamos catas y eventos para empresas y extranjeros.

Owner of the brand, in charge of daily operations and strategy.
The Cool Elephant is an established e-commerce clothing brand, that produces comfortable hoodies and t-shirts for the european teenager market.
Galeria de arte que representa artistas de todo el mundo / Art gallery working with artists from around the world.

A cargo de las ventas y posicionamiento de marca tanto en las operaciones nacionales, como en el exterior (USA, EU, Sudamerica). Desarrollo de estrategias de comercialización. Manejo y coaching de fuerza de ventas. Representación en ferias nacionales e internacionales.

A cargo de la organización de los eventos del Convivium Buenos Aires Norte, incluyendo cenas, degustaciones y laboratorios del gusto, donde pusimos en valor decenas de alimentos y productores,  logrando el reconocimiento por parte de los consumidores y difundiendo la filosofía Slow Food.

Asimismo participe en la comunicación del movimiento Slow Food, tanto en prensa como de forma digital.

También acompañe como coordinador a la comitiva de productores invitados al evento Terramadre en Torino, Italia en el año 2004; y nuevamente volví como productor (Bodega Palo Alto) al Salone del Gusto 2006.

Departamento de marketing, desarrollando tareas de comunicación interna y externa. Responsable del área de prensa y RRPP. Captación y mantenimiento de clientes. Redacción y diseño de piezas institucionales (newsletter, cartas, notas para web y diarios, avisos y folletos). Presentación e implementación de planes anuales de marketing. Análisis estadístico del mercado en busca de oportunidades de negocios y desarrollo de herramientas para su implementación. Desarrollo de presentaciones a clientes y potenciales inversores. Pasantía en sector de ventas.

education.schoolName: Universidad de Ciencias Empresariales y Sociales

volunteering.description: Estuve a cargo de la organización mensual de eventos relacionados con la puesta en valor de los productos/productores de alimentos gourmet involucrados en el movimiento Slow Food.

headline: Tech Team Lead | Project Management, Software Development
about:
Hi! I'm Alan, a passionate technology leader and team builder. My engineering background and experience founding my own development company have provided a strong foundation for building and leading high-performing teams. At Ebury, I further honed my skills managing diverse teams of mobile, web, and API developers, consistently driving them to exceed ambitious goals. I firmly believe in fostering collaborative environments where every team member can thrive and contribute their best.

My experience spans various industries, from fintech (like Ebury) and entrepreneurial ventures to the dynamic world of entertainment. This diverse background gives me a unique, holistic understanding of technology and its impact on business. I'm driven by the challenge of developing innovative solutions that not only solve real-world problems but also deliver tangible business value. I thrive on finding the sweet spot where technical feasibility, user experience, and business strategy intersect. I'm constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to learn, innovate, and lead impactful projects. I'm excited to connect with forward-thinking companies and professionals on my ongoing journey of growth and innovation.

experience.description:
As a Mobile Team Lead, I spearheaded the full lifecycle of mobile app development, guiding a team of developers from concept to launch and beyond. This involved meticulous workflow management, ensuring the timely delivery of high-quality, user-centric mobile applications. My responsibilities encompassed defining project goals, establishing realistic timelines and budgets, delegating tasks effectively, collaborating with cross-functional teams and stakeholders, and leading the charge in recruitment efforts. I fostered a culture of continuous improvement, providing mentorship and guidance to team members, proactively identifying and resolving development roadblocks, and maintaining transparent communication with stakeholders through regular progress updates and meetings.

My expertise extends beyond mobile development. I led the UX Enhancement team for Ebury's web application, driving improvements to user experience and interface design. In my current role as Channels Core Team Lead, I manage a diverse team of developers responsible for the development and maintenance of Ebury's core digital channels, including the mobile app (iOS and Android), API, web platform, and authentication projects. This experience has honed my abilities in leading complex, multi-platform technology initiatives, delivering seamless and secure user experiences across all touchpoints.

I was responsible for planning, coordinating, and managing the development of the front-end of a web and mobile application for many OTT's. This involves working with a team of designers, developers, and other stakeholders to ensure that the project is delivered on time, within budget, and to the desired level of quality. Some specific tasks that I was responsible for include:

- Setting project goals and objectives.
- Assigning tasks and responsibilities to team members.
- Providing regular updates to stakeholders about the project's progress
- Identifying and resolving any issues or roadblocks that may arise during the development process
- Leading project meetings and communication with the team and stakeholders
- Ensuring that the final product meets the project's requirements and meets the desired level of quality.

I helped organisations develop and implement mobile strategies that align with their business goals. This can include identifying opportunities to leverage mobile technologies, developing mobile apps or other mobile solutions, and providing guidance on how to effectively use mobile marketing to reach target audiences.

We specialize in bringing new products to life, with a strong focus on mobile development using platforms such as UNITY 3D, React-Native, Flutter, or Ionic. We pride ourselves on our attention to detail in the UX/UI design process to create visually appealing products.
We offer custom solutions tailored to our clients' needs and are able to join projects at any stage.
As a company founder, I lead and oversee all aspects of our business, including strategy, development, and client relationships.

I was responsible for supporting the sales team in the identification and qualification of business opportunities for mobile products and smart signage products focused on B2B market, as well as providing technical expertise to potential clients. Some specific tasks that a pre-sales engineer might be responsible for include:

- Working with the sales team to identify and qualify potential business opportunities in the B2B market
- Providing technical expertise and support to potential clients during the sales process
- Assessing the technical requirements and limitations of potential clients and recommending appropriate solutions
- Collaborating with product managers and engineering teams to gather product information and demonstrations
- Participating in product demonstrations and presentations to potential clients
- Responding to technical questions and concerns from potential clients
- Providing guidance on the implementation and integration of Samsung products into clients' systems
- Assisting in the development of proposals and quotations for potential clients.

I was responsible for designing, developing, and delivering training and learning programs for employees. My goal was to ensure that participants acquire the skills and knowledge necessary to perform effectively in their roles and contribute to the achievement of the company's objectives.

I was responsible for designing the physical layout of integrated circuits (ICs) and ensuring that the layout meets the required specifications and standards. This involves working with a team of engineers and designers to create detailed layout plans and diagrams, and using specialized software to generate layouts that can be used to manufacture the ICs.

I was responsible for promoting and selling electronic components to companies and other buyers. My goal was to increase sales and market share for the company and establish long-term relationships with clients.
To carry out this task, I carried out activities such as:

- Identifying and prospecting new potential clients
- Establishing contact with existing and prospective clients
- Making presentations and demonstrations of the products
- Negotiating prices and sale terms
- Providing technical support and advice to clients
- Managing and tracking sales opportunities in the sales management system
- Participating in industry trade shows and events
- Keeping up to date on trends and innovations in the electronic component market

element.headline: Tech Team Lead | Project Management, Software Development
element.about:
Hi! I'm Alan, a passionate technology leader and team builder. My engineering background and experience founding my own development company have provided a strong foundation for building and leading high-performing teams. At Ebury, I further honed my skills managing diverse teams of mobile, web, and API developers, consistently driving them to exceed ambitious goals. I firmly believe in fostering collaborative environments where every team member can thrive and contribute their best.

My experience spans various industries, from fintech (like Ebury) and entrepreneurial ventures to the dynamic world of entertainment. This diverse background gives me a unique, holistic understanding of technology and its impact on business. I'm driven by the challenge of developing innovative solutions that not only solve real-world problems but also deliver tangible business value. I thrive on finding the sweet spot where technical feasibility, user experience, and business strategy intersect. I'm constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to learn, innovate, and lead impactful projects. I'm excited to connect with forward-thinking companies and professionals on my ongoing journey of growth and innovation.

experience.description:
As a Mobile Team Lead, I spearheaded the full lifecycle of mobile app development, guiding a team of developers from concept to launch and beyond. This involved meticulous workflow management, ensuring the timely delivery of high-quality, user-centric mobile applications. My responsibilities encompassed defining project goals, establishing realistic timelines and budgets, delegating tasks effectively, collaborating with cross-functional teams and stakeholders, and leading the charge in recruitment efforts. I fostered a culture of continuous improvement, providing mentorship and guidance to team members, proactively identifying and resolving development roadblocks, and maintaining transparent communication with stakeholders through regular progress updates and meetings.

My expertise extends beyond mobile development. I led the UX Enhancement team for Ebury's web application, driving improvements to user experience and interface design. In my current role as Channels Core Team Lead, I manage a diverse team of developers responsible for the development and maintenance of Ebury's core digital channels, including the mobile app (iOS and Android), API, web platform, and authentication projects. This experience has honed my abilities in leading complex, multi-platform technology initiatives, delivering seamless and secure user experiences across all touchpoints.

I was responsible for planning, coordinating, and managing the development of the front-end of a web and mobile application for many OTT's. This involves working with a team of designers, developers, and other stakeholders to ensure that the project is delivered on time, within budget, and to the desired level of quality. Some specific tasks that I was responsible for include:

- Setting project goals and objectives.
- Assigning tasks and responsibilities to team members.
- Providing regular updates to stakeholders about the project's progress
- Identifying and resolving any issues or roadblocks that may arise during the development process
- Leading project meetings and communication with the team and stakeholders
- Ensuring that the final product meets the project's requirements and meets the desired level of quality.

I helped organisations develop and implement mobile strategies that align with their business goals. This can include identifying opportunities to leverage mobile technologies, developing mobile apps or other mobile solutions, and providing guidance on how to effectively use mobile marketing to reach target audiences.

We specialize in bringing new products to life, with a strong focus on mobile development using platforms such as UNITY 3D, React-Native, Flutter, or Ionic. We pride ourselves on our attention to detail in the UX/UI design process to create visually appealing products.
We offer custom solutions tailored to our clients' needs and are able to join projects at any stage.
As a company founder, I lead and oversee all aspects of our business, including strategy, development, and client relationships.

I was responsible for supporting the sales team in the identification and qualification of business opportunities for mobile products and smart signage products focused on B2B market, as well as providing technical expertise to potential clients. Some specific tasks that a pre-sales engineer might be responsible for include:

- Working with the sales team to identify and qualify potential business opportunities in the B2B market
- Providing technical expertise and support to potential clients during the sales process
- Assessing the technical requirements and limitations of potential clients and recommending appropriate solutions
- Collaborating with product managers and engineering teams to gather product information and demonstrations
- Participating in product demonstrations and presentations to potential clients
- Responding to technical questions and concerns from potential clients
- Providing guidance on the implementation and integration of Samsung products into clients' systems
- Assisting in the development of proposals and quotations for potential clients.

I was responsible for designing, developing, and delivering training and learning programs for employees. My goal was to ensure that participants acquire the skills and knowledge necessary to perform effectively in their roles and contribute to the achievement of the company's objectives.

I was responsible for designing the physical layout of integrated circuits (ICs) and ensuring that the layout meets the required specifications and standards. This involves working with a team of engineers and designers to create detailed layout plans and diagrams, and using specialized software to generate layouts that can be used to manufacture the ICs.

I was responsible for promoting and selling electronic components to companies and other buyers. My goal was to increase sales and market share for the company and establish long-term relationships with clients.
To carry out this task, I carried out activities such as:

- Identifying and prospecting new potential clients
- Establishing contact with existing and prospective clients
- Making presentations and demonstrations of the products
- Negotiating prices and sale terms
- Providing technical support and advice to clients
- Managing and tracking sales opportunities in the sales management system
- Participating in industry trade shows and events
- Keeping up to date on trends and innovations in the electronic component market
